verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H5833>help,<s%> and <S%H8172>rely<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> because they are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and in <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> because they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>strong,<s%> but they <S%H8159>don't<s%> look to the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H1875>don't<s%> seek <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>

Yet he also is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>disaster,<s%> and will not call <S%H5493>back<s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> but will <S%H6965>arise<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> and against the <S%H5833>help<s%> of those who <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

Now the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and not <S%H410>God;<s%> and their <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and not <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> both he who <S%H5826>helps<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble,<s%> and he who is <S%H5826>helped<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and they all shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H738>me,<s%> "As the lion and the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H1897>growling<s%> over his <S%H2964>prey,<s%> if a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> is called <S%H7121>together<s%> against <S%H2865>him,<s%> will not be dismayed at their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> nor <S%H6031>abase<s%> himself for their <S%H1995>noise,<s%> so <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H6633>fight<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and on its <S%H1389>heights.<s%>

As <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H5774>hovering,<s%> so <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will <S%H1598>protect<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> He will <S%H1598>protect<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H6452>it.<s%> He will pass over and preserve <S%H4422>it.<s%>"
<S%H7725>Return<s%> to him from whom you have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5627>revolted,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> shall cast <S%H3988>away<s%> his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2399><s%> â€” sin which your own <S%H3027>hands<s%> have made for <S%H6213>you.<s%>

"The <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> not of <S%H376>man;<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> not of <S%H120>mankind,<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H5127>him.<s%> He will flee <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and his young <S%H970>men<s%> will become subject to forced <S%H4522>labor.<s%>

His <S%H5553>rock<s%> will pass <S%H5674>away<s%> by reason of <S%H4032>terror,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> will be <S%H4032>afraid<s%> of the <S%H5251>banner,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> whose <S%H217>fire<s%> is in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and his <S%H8574>furnace<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
